snippet.title: Blast the Past - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for our game Blast the Past!
Get Blast the Past on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/943170/Blast_the_Past/

Blast the Past is a VR physics-puzzle in which the player has to control a wrecking ball vehicle, utilizing the vehicle controls, to destroy the last old building in a modern city without damaging any of the nearby skyscrapers.

A 7 man team created Blast the Past in 3 months: 
Development team:
Philipp Stenger        - Game Designer/Engineer
János Weyhknecht - 3D Artist 
Marvin Spahn          - 3D Artist 
Nicholas Nickel       - 3D Artist 
Kylan Lenderink       - Sound 
Lucca Riitano           - Sound
Isabell Starke           - Voice

Music:
Admiral Termo - Proximity Error (https://soundcloud.com/admiraltermo/proximity-error)
Braessluft - Pro Caro
F A S - Merturio
Phizzy - Eastscape
Soundink - Sunrise (https://soundcloud.com/soundinkofficial/sunrise?in=soundinkofficial/sets/wake-ep)
Spectrum - Mark VII
Studiogegner - Maditaktion
Tschaikovsky - Waltz of the Flowers (https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary/music)

Special Thanks to
Martin Kühr

#studentgames #studentprojects  #vr #virtualreality #hda #indie
